hero.description: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to predict crop yields, optimize farming strategies, and make data-driven decisions that boost your agricultural productivity.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Farming
features.subtitle: Everything you need to optimize your agricultural operations and maximize profitability

yieldPrediction.title: Yield Predictions
yieldPrediction.description: Advanced ML models analyze soil, weather, and crop data to predict yields with exceptional accuracy

weatherIntegration.title: Weather Integration
weatherIntegration.description: Real-time weather data and forecasts to optimize planting schedules and resource allocation

smartOptimization.title: Smart Optimization
smartOptimization.description: AI-driven recommendations for fertilizer, irrigation, and crop rotation strategies

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.description: Identify potential threats and receive early warnings for disease, pests, and adverse conditions

howItWorks.title: How AgriBoost Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your farming operations

step1.title: Input Your Data
step1.description: Enter farm details including soil type, location, crop variety, and historical data through our intuitive interface

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: Our advanced algorithms process your data alongside weather patterns, soil conditions, and agricultural best practices

step3.title: Get Recommendations
step3.description: Receive detailed yield predictions and actionable optimization strategies to maximize your crop production

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Farm?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers who are already using AgriBoost to increase their yields and profitability

footer.description: Empowering farmers with AI-driven insights for sustainable and profitable agriculture

step1.description: Tell us about your farm location and land characteristics

step2.description: Tell us about the crops you want to grow and your yield goals

summary.title: Analysis Complete!

proTip.title: 💡 Pro Tip
proTip.content: Apply fertilizers based on soil moisture and weather conditions. Split nitrogen application for better efficiency and reduced environmental impact.

waterConservation.title: 💧 Water Conservation Benefits
waterConservation.benefit1: 30–40% water savings compared to flood irrigation
waterConservation.benefit3: Reduced weed growth and disease pressure
